DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine influence FAI abnormalities hip joint biomechanics .
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study quantify hip biomechanics subject without FAI . The result study advance understanding FAI alters biomechanics hip joint , improve diagnosis direct treatment strategy .
DOC.criteria: Patients present hip pain subsequently diagnose femoroacetabular impingement Subjects meet follow radiographic criterion cam pincer FAI , give opportunity volunteer study . Subjects demonstrate crossoversign lateral center edge angle ( LCEA ) without alpha angle , classify pincer FAI . Subjects alpha angle , without crossover sign LCEA , categorize cam type FAI . Finally , least one cam ( alpha angle ) pincer sign `` crossoversign lateral center edge angle ( LCEA ) '' classify mixed FAI . Control Population 12 control consist volunteer age range subject group ( 1835 year ) . Control hips screen standard AP radiograph . Normal volunteer radiographic evidence FAI , dysplasia joint deformity exclude . Subjects radiographic evidence osteoarthritis ( Tonnis Grade III IV ) exclude study focus mechanic hip prominent cartilage damage . Subjects prior procedure correct FAI hip condition exclude ( exploratory procedure include ) . Minors ( age 18 ) , mentally disabled , person incarcerate , parole , probation await trial , pregnant woman exclude study . A human Chorionic Gondaotropin ( hCG ) urine pregnancy test perform woman prior study . Subjects allergic contrast agent and/or lidocaine dismiss .
